definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: A typical example is the halogenation of a hydrocarbon.
sentences.chinese: 典型的例子是碳氫化合物的鹵化。

sentences.english: An unsaturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkene homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 不飽和碳氫化合物，屬於烯烴同系物。

sentences.english: It is a saturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkane homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 是飽和碳氫化合物，屬於烷烴同系物。

sentences.english: A large number of hydrocarbons such as benzopyrene are also mutagenic.
sentences.chinese: 大量碳氫化合物如苯並芘也是誘變劑。

sentences.english: Diesel is made up of hydrocarbons with roughly 12 to 24 carbons.
sentences.chinese: 柴油是由大約12到24個碳的碳氫化合物組成。

sentences.english: It has good chemical resistance to greases, oils and hydrocarbons.
sentences.chinese: 它具有良好的耐化學性，以油脂，油類和碳氫化合物。

sentences.english: Electrolysis of water, catalytic decomposition of hydrocarbons?
sentences.chinese: 電解水，催化分解碳氫化合物？

sentences.english: The aromatics are ringed hydrocarbons, such as benzene, toluene and xylene. Benzene is used to make polystyrenes (e.g.
sentences.chinese: 芳烴是環狀碳氫化合物，如苯，甲苯和二甲苯。

sentences.english: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.chinese: 某碳氫化合物已知可能是烯烴或是烷烴。

sentences.english: To do this, synthetically manufactured hydrocarbons and salts are added.
sentences.chinese: 要做到這一點，合成生產的碳氫化合物和鹽被加進。

sentences.english: He looked back to see the hydrocarbon count registering from the exhaust sniffer.
sentences.chinese: 他回頭看了看尾氣探測器顯示的碳氫化合物讀數。

sentences.english: Charcoal-grilled foods contain a comparatively higher level of Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons(PAHs).
sentences.chinese: 碳燒食物所含的多環芳香族碳氫化合物通常相對較高。

sentences.english: There are several chemical processes that can change one hydrocarbon into another.
sentences.chinese: 幾個化攻過程就可以將一種碳氫化合物變成另一種。

sentences.english: The primary forces causing migration of hydrocarbons are buoyancy and capillarity.
sentences.chinese: 引起碳氫化合物運移的主要作用力是浮托力和毛細力。
